name: Pee-er the french park liquid cleaning robot
name_original: Pee-er the french park liquid cleaning robot
description:
Clean up the bear poo from the park with ur power hose

Made in blender 2.72

Goal:

Get the bear poo to the hole/ pond in the middle of the park using ur power hose (achieving this goal may crash the game:P)

controlles:

Controlles are badly mapped ree map them with xpadder or something

keyboard only unless u reemap

wasd to aim hose

arows to move

space to shoot

q e to rotate

If u get stuck press o to restart

start is enter
